body_html:
It is possible that you haven't installed the CUDA driver properly.

What is the output of:
$nvcc -V
and
$nvidia-smi

Go to your CUDA Samples folder and run the ./deviceQuery script to check if your system is finding your graphics card.
body_text:
It is possible that you haven't installed the CUDA driver properly.
What is the output of:
$nvcc -V
and
$nvidia-smi
Go to your CUDA Samples folder and run the ./deviceQuery script to check if your system is finding your graphics card.
body:
It is possible that you haven't installed the CUDA driver properly.

What is the output of:
`$nvcc -V`
and 
`$nvidia-smi`

Go to your CUDA Samples folder and run the `./deviceQuery` script to check if your system is finding your graphics card.
